tool_description: YippieMove is the world's most powerful email migration tool. Regardless if you're planning to migrate one, one hundred or thousands of accounts, YippieMove is your best friend.
name: YippieMove
title: YippieMove

api_list.name: Get List of Move Jobs

optional_parameters.name: created_at__gt
optional_parameters.description: filter by created_at greater than the specified ISO date string.

optional_parameters.name: created_at__lt
optional_parameters.description: filter by created_at lesser than the specified ISO date string.

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: an integer count of results to skip.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: an integer number of maximum results to return. Must be less than 201. Defaults to 200.

optional_parameters.name: created_at__gt

optional_parameters.name: created_at__lt
optional_parameters.description: filter by created_at lesser than the specified ISO date string.

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: an integer count of results to skip.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: an integer number of maximum results to return. Must be less than 201. Defaults to 200.

api_list.name: Get a List of Email Folders for a particular Account

optional_parameters.name: created_at__gt
optional_parameters.description: filter by created_at greater than the specified ISO date string.

optional_parameters.name: created_at__lt
optional_parameters.description: filter by created_at lesser than the specified ISO date string.

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: an integer count of results to skip.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: an integer number of maximum results to return. Must be less than 201. Defaults to 200.

optional_parameters.name: offset
